headline: Solventum Announces Launch of Secondary Offering of Common Stock
summary: Solventum Corporation (NYSE: SOLV, "Company" or "Solventum") today announced the launch of a secondary offering (the "Offering") of 8,800,000 shares of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share, by 3M Company (the "Selling Shareholder"). All of the shares of common stock are being sold by the Selling Shareholder, and Solventum will not receive any proceeds from the Offering.

headline: Solventum Corporation (SOLV) Reports Q2 2025 Results; Mizuho and Wells Fargo Reiterate Their Ratings
summary: Solventum Corporation (NYSE:SOLV) is included in our list of the 12 Cheap Value Stocks to Buy Now According to Seth Klarman. On August 7, 2025, Solventum Corporation (NYSE:SOLV) announced its results for Q2 2025. The quarter marked the fifth consecutive quarter of positive volume growth, with the company recording sales of $2.2 billion, up 3.9% […]
